headerSection.titleOne: Full-stack Developer - TypeScript, Next.js, React, & MongoDB
headerSection.bio: With five years in educational technology, I have cultivated a strong interest in software engineering. Over the past two years, I have developed full-stack applications using TypeScript, Next.js, and MongoDB, delivering solutions for both work and personal projects. I bring strong problem-solving skills, a passion for programming, and a commitment to life-long learning. My background in content and data management further enhances my ability to create efficient, user-focused applications.

responsibilities: Built a scalable online rental store showcasing over 100 products and services, optimizing UX and pricing features for E-Nite Services in Lausanne, Switzerland.
Developed Classroom Reactor, a proof-of-concept LMS designed to streamline educational processes, improving data management and content delivery for BigByte Education
Created Reactive Games, a tool leveraging the ChatGPT API to generate teaching materials, enhancing learning for educators and students alike.
Using NodeJS, Express and MongoDB, built a personalized flashcard app for learning Chinese, featuring spaced-repetition and review history.
Developed an automated reporting tool, reducing manual workload, and saving the company the cost of hiring external developers.
Enhanced engagement by creating dynamic, HTML-based homepages summarizing weekly educational content for over 500 users.
Coordinated with six branch teams to develop digital teaching materials, adopted by 65% of staff.
Managed a learning management system for 500 users, ensuring reliable performance and data integrity to enhance learning outcomes.
Provided daily technical support and training to all employees, students, and parents.
Led a team of four members delivering a full curriculum update over three years.
